doc.subcontractPlan: C: PLAN REQUIRED - INCENTIVE NOT INCLUDED
doc.descriptionOfContractRequirement: IGF::OT::IGF CD-M CONSTRUCTION DIVISION-CONSTRUCTION CONTRACT MODIFICATION R00106, $556,622.00 NECESSITY FOR CHANGE THE MOUNTAINVIEW PROJECT WAS APPROACHING ITS MAXIMUM COST THRESHOLD. REPROGRAMMING OF FUNDING WAS REQUESTED BUT A SUCCESSFUL OUTCOME WAS NOT ASSURED. IN ORDER TO PREVENT OVERSPENDING AND INSURE SUFFICIENT FUNDING FOR MANDATORY CHANGES THE GOVERNMENT DIRECTED HENSEL PHELPS CONSTRUCTION CO. TO DEFER PURCHASING AND/OR CONSTRUCTION ON THE DEFERRED SCOPE ELEMENTS. DURING THE PERIOD THE WORK WAS DEFERRED, 26 AUGUST 2015 TO 2 DECEMBER 2015, ADDITIONAL COST WERE INCURRED BY THE CONTRACTOR. THIS MODIFICATION COVERS THOSE COST. MODIFICATION R00008

doc.descriptionOfContractRequirement: NATIONAL BIO AND AGRO-DEFENSE FACILITY (NBAF), MANHATTAN, KANSAS P00063: GMP 3 THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO AWARD THE GUARANTEED MAXIMUM PRICE (GMP) FOR PHASE 3 OF THE NATIONAL BIO AND AGRO DEFENSE FACILITY. GMP 3 IS TO INCLUDE CONSTRUCTION OF THE MAIN LABORATORY, TRANSSHIPPING/VEHICLE MAINTENANCE, ANIMAL RECEIVING, VISITOR CENTER, WASTE WATER BUILDING, AND LANDSCAPING/SITE SECURITY.
